text: Just a minute. You just assured me that I could speak.
Sit down inside the car. We're not assuring anything.
We're under arrest. Look, I'm under what?
Have a look at the headlock here.
See that chap over there? Get your hand off my penis!
This is the bloke who got me on the penis before.
Why did you do this to me?
For what reason? What is the charge? Eating a meal?
Oh, that's a nice headlock, sir.
Ah, yes. I see that you know your judo well.
And you, sir? Are you waiting to receive my limp penis?
How dare I get your hands off me!
